website_summaries.verdict: Sure, this hive-shaped candle is unusual, but between its appealing bee theme, long burn time, and its self-extinguishing design, it’s well worth a closer look.
pros: Metal base supports and shapes wax coil
cons: This candle style isn’t for everyone

customer_reviews.title: bees are bright orange bees that break very easily when you put wings on
customer_reviews.text: bees are bright orange bees that break very easily when you put wings on. Not like the bees pictured which are more realistic. candle itself isn't as nice as pictured either. The only thing that really looks the same is the holder.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The stick on bees look like termites. The wax cannot be 100% beeswax - the candle would burn 2" in 5 minutes with a lot of smoke. Gave this as a gift and was embarrassed. This must be a knock off of better ones I've seen in Hearth & Home catalogue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice ish
customer_reviews.text: I bought this candle for a Bee lover. It’s a great size and looks pretty cool. The bee’s look dumber than advertised. They’re like a see through orange with clear wings you need to put together. It’s a gift so I haven’t burned it myself to smell it. I bought during winter so nothing melted in the shipping but with a candle like this id assume you’d need to be careful in summer.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lenich

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. This is very cute and made a nice gift in show but, it’s a stupid wasteful candle. You can only bring the wick up 2 inches at a time and that burns for 20mins or so. Then you have to let it cool before you can relight it. Pointless! Also, the bees in the picture are no beeswax but plastic cheap “bees” that you put on the candle. Cute candle for sitting on a shelf and doing nothing with but not worth the money. A big positive though is that it was not scented as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Candle!!! 🕯🐝🕯🐝🕯
customer_reviews.text: Very Cool Candle!!! 🕯🐝🕯🐝🕯 This is a very cute candle! I love the hive shape with the little bees that stick on it. There are also replacement candles if you burn through it all. I personally will keep it as decoration, and not light it up very often.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Like it...
customer_reviews.text: This candle is nice and looks just like the pics. The bees can be a little difficult to get stuck on with the wings too, but not a game changer. Gets a lot of attention and conversation as it is unique. Almost hate to burn it but have done it some. Just have to remember to blow it out before it gets too close to the clamp. If not, the wax gets melted in the clamp itself some and you end up having to dig it out of the clamp. From what I know now, I will definitely be buying a replacement spiral when this one is use up...
customer_reviews.author: Tideman

customer_reviews.title: Beeswax for the win!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool looking candle that burns at just about the exact rate they say it does. Made from real beeswax that has a very light scent so don’t expect to be overtaken by smell or anything. Burns super clean and with a nice light to it. Also a good conversation piece, if your other party is interested in esoteric facts about candles. If not, their loss.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I think it burns faster than advertised but it's definitely a conversation piece and it does stop burning once the candle hits the metal piece. I wish the candle had a better smell - it smells sort of stale not like my other beeswax candles. Also the bees are difficult to put on so I ended up just leaving them off. I might invest in another one of the candles, this time scented. Took longer than expected to get here, but I was in no rush. Price was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Erica J. Price

customer_reviews.title: ... for Two of my family members and they absolutely Loved them! They sent me pics and the bees ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift for Two of my family members and they absolutely Loved them! They sent me pics and the bees are as in the photo and are adorable! I definitely recommend this 70 hr- Beehive Candle! They were shipped quickly! I would purchase it again and will be gifting the refills eventually also!
customer_reviews.author: Marie H. Florida, U.S.A

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like you think! Great size too
customer_reviews.text: Love!!! Medium, not so big it’s hard to place, not so small you feel like you wasted your money. Not to mention it smells amazing!!! Literally, for a week my entire house smelt like honey (open floor plan)
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Hoskinson

customer_reviews.title: Melts in the mail...
customer_reviews.text: Don't order this product in the summer. The beeswax is soft enough that the coil melts together, preventing it from being uncoiled or at least ruining the coil once attempted.
customer_reviews.author: O157:H7

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: What a great unique gift. And the person loved it. A great item at a great price with fast shipping What more could you want. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: raytexguy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!! It puts it self out once it reaches the base. 1 inch does equal 20 minutes. I bought another as a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but finicky
customer_reviews.text: This candle is a bit finicky. It took me a bit of time to figure out its quirks. I contemplated returning it, but have decided to keep it. It’s unusual and i like how it looks in our bedroom. It doesn’t stay lit for long.. and the scissors are difficult to open for my arthritic fingers sometimes. But I like it anyways. It’s different. And worth it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Msmellowmood

customer_reviews.title: Very unique and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Very unique and stylish. I purchased as a give and also for myself. Add a nice look to the living room. FYI bees not included as seen in picture ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful candle
customer_reviews.text: Just love this candle! Perfect size, larger than I expected. The bees are ridiculous just threw them away. There is no scent at all which is good since my husband can't stand smelly anything! Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: a fun candle
customer_reviews.text: It would be better if the bees were metal, but overall a fantastic item. Looks great and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sami Nammari

customer_reviews.title: Bee
customer_reviews.text: I love this and the history behind it. I am really enjoying this. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Trinna

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in good condition. It looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in good condition. It looks beautiful. I have not had an occasion to use it yet but it appears to be all it is advertised to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: So gave this as a gift from one bee lover to another. Product overall was great but the bee accent were BAD she had to go buy better ones
customer_reviews.author: regina messer

customer_reviews.title: Cutie beeeeeeeeeees
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my friend and she loves it. It’s so cute I’ll have to get one for myself as well!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: This is neat, I got it for my mother and she says she likes it
customer_reviews.author: Shondia H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Unique
customer_reviews.text: Great great great ...but make sure to read the instructions on handling the bees wax rope or you can end up ruining it.
customer_reviews.author: metalgodz

customer_reviews.title: Lame bees
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and was disappointed with the bright orange bees. The picture/box clearly shows bees with stripes and white wings. The bees are plastic and do not stick to hive. Sad. Still a cool candle tho
customer_reviews.author: CrazyCatLady22

customer_reviews.title: Perfect unique gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for family member she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Get's lots of attention.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to a minimalist person. They loved it. People always comment on how cool it is and ask where to get it. Expensive candle to buy for oneself, but worth the price as a unique gift for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Smelled like kerosene and was MELTED BEYOND USE!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Smelled like kerosene! Was melted into the styrofoam and could not be removed from styrofoam! How does this company charge this amount for a refill? You should just buy whole new product. How was it melted? I ordered in December. Please!!?
customer_reviews.author: Shirley W.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply bee attachments, but not terrible.
customer_reviews.text: The attachable bees that come with it are rather cheaply and I was hoping they'd look better. But, it's a cute gift that my sister really liked. If I knew what the bees really looked like (plastic like and dull) I probably would've found a better gift to give.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: The candle looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The candle looks just like the picture. However, the bees are just cheap, cheesy and orange plastic, nothing like the picture. The instructions for use are very complete and explicit, which is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: VRRMMM

customer_reviews.title: It's cute! Didn't bother with the bees bc as ...
customer_reviews.text: It's cute! Didn't bother with the bees bc as some reviews have stated they are very cheap and tacky. Definitely a conversation piece. Just not the wow I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing bees
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this candle specifically because of the little bees on the hive. Unfortunately, 1 of 2 was delivered w/out my bees. I’m super disappointed in that but pleased with the candle overall.
customer_reviews.author: sheshannah

customer_reviews.title: This product has a really good concept but the design is somewhat imperfect
customer_reviews.text: This product has a really good concept but the design is somewhat imperfect. It is slightly irritating to deal with getting the wax to release from the coil smoothly and get up through the wick-controller. Still - its a cool idea and a cool gift idea for a relatively cheap price -especially for people who enjoy sheik looking stuff and candles, in particular.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Guza

customer_reviews.title: Unusual and unique. Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Very unique. I’ve never seen anything like this before. The bees are fun to place on the candle. I bought 2! One for me and one for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Carter

customer_reviews.title: Cute candle but the bees do not look like the picture there orange no color variation but overall ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute candle but the bees do not look like the picture there orange no color variation but overall cute candle
customer_reviews.author: christina morris

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to open the box. These are just lovely. Although I thankfully haven’t had to use it, they are so nice using as decor! The refills are expensive but I love this design.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this contraption
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this contraption! However I’m sooo disappointed that it’s not real beeswax! Does not smell Or feel or look like it. I Use beeswax candles all The time and I can tell! That’s the whole reason I bought it. 😩
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Makes a unique gift...everyone loves these "candles by the hour". Best of all is that refills are available. Wish the stand and holder were constructed a bit better, but OK none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Wally

customer_reviews.title: The bees look NOTHING like the pic
customer_reviews.text: False advertisement! I should have read the reviews. The bees look NOTHING like the pic. They are ridiculous looking. They need to send everyone out new bees who got this ugly batch. Ruins it completely for me.
customer_reviews.author: corina v drennen

customer_reviews.title: love the beeswax and the look of it
customer_reviews.text: This candle is so unique - our whole family enjoys it, love the beeswax and the look of it. Would buy for gifts for family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Gina B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: My bee loving daughter in law is going to enjoy this so much💜
customer_reviews.author: Dove

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice, burns too quickly
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice with mild honey scent and no soot. My only complaint is that it burns too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey401

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these bought them as a gift for two different people
customer_reviews.author: GTO

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when you order, references the time of year, it is a candle.
customer_reviews.text: A present for my daughter who loved it and said the scent was honey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute candle!
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells amazing and is so cute!! Its hard to have it burning for long periods of time though because you have to keep adjusting the wax.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife as gift and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What an amazing candle! My friend loved it as a gift and its all thanks to you! Prompt service, amazing products, Tweed and Till are the real deal. Can't wait to shop with you again! Those tools you carry look especially fun!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting candle
customer_reviews.text: Love the look for this candle! It last A really long time and you can purchase refills
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth M Good

customer_reviews.title: Cute candle but burns out in minutes
customer_reviews.text: As neat as this is as a decorative piece it’s not realistic for burning. You have to pull up the wick and it burns down within minutes. But beautiful candle
customer_reviews.author: damronville

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for my dad
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves candles and he is loving this one!! It comes all set up and is a really cool conversation starter
customer_reviews.author: amy badowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great unique candle. Would make a fun gift. Burns well and easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my future mother and law and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Stegner

customer_reviews.title: Awful product
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Filled with stuff that was hard to clear. Does not fit structure properly.
customer_reviews.author: Karan A. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend and she really liked it. Very unique and catches the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Love the way it looks. Love that it smells exactly like honey. Just great!
customer_reviews.author: Blerina Brugess

customer_reviews.title: Awesome candle!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool awesome candle!!! Just beware of buying it in the summer, great conversation piece and table center piece!!!
customer_reviews.author: K S

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy.. Half the bee's wings post were broken ...
customer_reviews.text: Not Happy .. Half the bee's wings post were broken so they could not be attached.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, there isn’t much of a scent but it’s very nice to clean air. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan fanjul

customer_reviews.title: Great candle, but cheapy base
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered me this candle and I really liked it at first. Once we started using it, we realized that the clamp that holds the wax is really hard to open. The wax unravels easily, but it's really hard to open the clamp wide enough to easily pull the wanted wax through. It does burn evenly, but I think the base could be made a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to cut the wick
customer_reviews.text: I love the candle but the work was too hard to cut the wax
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: A little big for the standard dresser.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks; but once it arrived, it looked a little out of place on a standard sized dresser/table/mantle. Returned it and will get the smaller version.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not practical.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use. Looks cute. Bought it because burning beeswax is supposedly good for the air in “negative” “ion” something, something.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopping Addict

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product so much that I bought it as a gift too!
customer_reviews.author: C Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Don't walk away!
customer_reviews.text: We have had issues with the candle not burning out when it got to the clamp. Maybe we are doing something wrong. We just try to keep a close eye on it. Like you should with all candles. :)
customer_reviews.author: C. Efthim

customer_reviews.title: wax melts everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought the refil thinking it would be like the original, but it burns super fast and wax goes everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. It is just liked pic. Love it. Wasn't one for me
customer_reviews.author: DebH

customer_reviews.title: Gr8 but one thing
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only problem is when it burns all the way down the wick is sucken in. So when you go to relight it the wax ends up putting flame out. Gr8 conversation starter.
customer_reviews.author: liso

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT FOR FAMILY
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT HAS A HOLIDAY GIFT FOR IN LAWS. VERY UNIQUE GREAT DECOR AND IS A CANDLE IF NEEDED. THANKS GUYS
customer_reviews.author: ERIC

customer_reviews.title: Great Unique Candle
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved it and it is quite the talking piece.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: Beehive Candle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this candle as a Christmas gift for my sister-in-law. I love the way it looks and it made a unique gift. My sister-in-law also really loved it. The candle arrived quickly and was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s natural bee wax. Looks great. Wife loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... all candles by the hour - this is a great
customer_reviews.text: my wife is assembling a collection of all candles by the hour - this is a great addition
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: This is What You Should Buy, Unless You Want Your Candles to Make Your House Smell Like a Cartoony French Whorehouse
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous gift idea. I can't think of anyone who wouldn't like it, except for those people who like vanilla-cinnamon-scented tea candles. This thing looks cool and works exactly as advertised. The flies, by the way--I wasn't clear on the concept--come with the candle and you stick them on wherever your aesthetic impulses take you.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Dilettante

customer_reviews.title: Cute and no toxic
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and non toxic I admit I did color black stripes on the brown bees. Beeswax is safe to burn instead of soy or paraffin. Too cute!
customer_reviews.author: FRAM

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, good quality wax, works as described. A little awkward to unwind wax to put through the holder but worth it for the unusual design.
customer_reviews.author: L. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality wax, great that they sell replacements as this is not the kind of thing that you can just replace in a high-street shop.
customer_reviews.author: L. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Candle looks okay, but the loose bits of styrofoam packaging are awful. They went everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Orange Zephyr

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: Pretty in a unique way, but bees fall off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the top had melted a little but easily molded it back into place
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and was disfigured.. the top had melted a little but easily molded it back into place. Lovely product 😍
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I got beeswax
customer_reviews.text: It burns much quicker than advertised and it smells like paraffin wax. I like it but I'm not sure I got what I expected. It doesn't smell like honey at all. I expected it to have a honey smell.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: They look nothing like the ones in the listing photo or on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I just gave this as a gift and was embarrassed to see the ridiculous orange bees that were included. They look nothing like the ones in the listing photo or on the box and it cheapened the gift in my opinion. Attached are photos of what the bees actually looked like (the first two photos) and what they look like on the listing photo. I wish I would have chosen one of the other styles without the silly plastic orange bees
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Candle but Bees are cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Love the candle but the bees are a big disappointment. The ones in the picture are super cute but what I got was cheap plastic orange bees that break when you try to put the wings on. I wouldn’t have been disappointed if that was what the picture showed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Annoying--Like Bees!
customer_reviews.text: This candle is adorable, but when I received it, there was styrofoam stuck all over the candle and I had to clean it for an hour before using. I wish they would use something else to pack their boxes.... Also, the bees are not already on the candle, they are in a bag and there are instructions to melt them on the candle. Overall, for the expensive price, I did not enjoy having to do so much work to set up the candle in terms of cleaning and decorating. Nevertheless, it is a very beautiful product that looks great with a rustic home decor!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Orange Bees?
customer_reviews.text: Like the idea, would have liked it more if the bees were the ones they show in the advertisement and not the orange ones it really comes with. I would have paid more for the ones I thought I was getting., lesson learned. I've attached a photo so look before you buy, you might not like orange plastic bees.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Bees Wax Nights...
customer_reviews.text: Very rustic look to it, and that clip that holds the wax gives it that steampunk look to it. Everyone that comes over for a visit spots it and it becomes a great conversation piece. Caution! Lots of little bees come with it and you'll feel bad not using all of them and when you do it becomes too busy. I recommend using 3-5 bees not all 12!! lol
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Not beeswax!
customer_reviews.text: It is not 100% beeswax as claimed in the description. Even the box says just made from beeswax. If you ever got a real beeswax candle you can tell the difference in color and smell. It should be dark orange color and smell mildly sweet. This one smells like petrochemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Nice except the packaging
customer_reviews.text: It’s a super gift. I bought 2 for friends. I would have given it 5 stars but inside the package the styrofoam was broken down and all over the candle’s package. It made it look cheep. I cleaned it out, removed the styrofoam and put tissue paper instead.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It hasn't bothered my allergies.
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed burning my candle. It looks so pretty when burning and when it is not burning. It hasn't bothered my allergies, which is a big reason I purchased it. The bees add a very pretty detail.
customer_reviews.author: Randyntona

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a 16th anniversary gift (16 is the "wax" anniversary gift). He's a bee keeper so it was right up his alley. It's certainly a conversation piece. Well made. A great gift!
customer_reviews.author: A M Austin

customer_reviews.title: Time adjustable candle.
customer_reviews.text: Love this candle because it blows itself off. It’s pretty and works with my decore. I also use it as a timer. When candle goes out everyone goes to bed. The candle rope is time adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Marchuk

customer_reviews.title: Termites
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and my friend loved it. It is a really unique candle. The bees do look like termites though... That was the only thing that could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Lily1943

customer_reviews.title: Burns like a cansle should
customer_reviews.text: This product review is for the refill only without bees. I originally purchased this a year or two ago and thought i would never burn it because it was so darn cute, but burn it did. The wax burns very well with virtually no dripping. This came in an "official" box from manufacturer. I will say I bought this item from another web store and it was delivered without original box and the foam insert was stuck to the wax making it unusable. So I guess you need to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Just Human

customer_reviews.title: I guess I should have read reviews before ordering. ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have read reviews before ordering. The bees included with my candle are bright orange. Not even close to cute bees in picture. If part of the reason you are purchasing is due to cute bees, don't order. I chose not to use the bees on my candle.
customer_reviews.author: vicledsome

customer_reviews.title: Beehive Candle by the Hour
customer_reviews.text: This candle is adorable! Easy to use ( the candle was already setting on the holder -- I just had to unwind a bit and insert into the clip). It came with a package of plastic bees which was just too fun placing about the candle. They even sent more bees than needed which is good for when I need to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Queen

customer_reviews.title: Not a real wax, toxic!
customer_reviews.text: Fake product, toxic! not a real wax at all! So disappointed, but it has a cute look
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Big
customer_reviews.text: Cute find. Bigger than I thought! Bees are nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Angie F

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! The little bees are adorable. I've only burned it once so far and it did not extinguish on its own as I thought it was supposed to, but then again I don't think the clamp was as tight as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: giranimal

customer_reviews.title: Fake Beeswax = Gross
customer_reviews.text: This is fraud as the candle is definitely NOT beeswax (although the first inch might of been - it’s a trick) but made of petroleum and parrifin and colored to look like beeswax. Scam Candle would be a fitting name for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt stay lit but then it looks great why would I burn it
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Unique candle minus the bugs
customer_reviews.text: Cute candle but the plastic bees are creepy and don’t look like bees. More like a tan fly.
customer_reviews.author: Skg

customer_reviews.title: Clever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adore this. It looks even better in person and the idea is so clever. We did not end up using the bees, I didn't think they added anything (just personal preference)
customer_reviews.author: travelingmom

product_meta.title: Candle by the Hour 70-Hour Beehive Candle, Eco-friendly Natural Beeswax with Cotton Wick
product_meta.description: Size:Beehive CandleMADE WITH ALL-NATURAL BEESWAX CANDLE: Specially designed all-natural beeswax providing a brilliant light without the toxicity that petroleum based paraffin candles emit.
feature_bullets: MADE WITH ALL-NATURAL BEESWAX CANDLE: Specially designed all-natural beeswax candle provides a brilliant light without the toxicity that petroleum based paraffin candles emit.

BURNS UP TO 70 HOURS: With its unique design, that is both rustic and innovative, this one-of-a-kind candle is specially designed to fill the room with a brilliant light and soft, pleasant scent of honey that will last for up to 70 hours.

THE CENTER OF ATTENTION: Candle by the Hour features a unique copper-tone stand with sleek and elegant wick holder paired with the spiral wax & wick design that will be topic of conversation in any room of the home.

BREATHE EASIER: Research shows that natural candles made from beeswax can help neutralize pollutants in the home - this includes dust, mold, mildew, and unwanted odors, making this a great gift for anyone that suffers from seasonal allergies or symptoms of asthma.
REDUCES STRESS & RESTLESSENSS: Beeswax candles have been known for providing an environment of relaxation and tranquility, reducing stress and helping with sleep.
